forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Drizzle likely before 10am, then rain. Cloudy. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. South wind 14 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

weather_report:
As dawn unfurls its muted glow over Downtown San Francisco, a shroud of clouds lingers, wrapping the city in a damp embrace. The day begins with a promise of rain, a steady drizzle likely lingering until late morning, followed by more substantial downpours. The air feels cool, hinting at a temperature slide that will keep things cool throughout the day, as the winds from the south gently whisper through the streets, adding a briskness that may just linger in one's bones. 

Visibility may lack clarity, with the fog rolling in and out, dancing between the grandeur of the Golden Gate and the skyline’s unique silhouettes. Dress warmly and in layers; a raincoat or a sturdy umbrella will be your companions as you navigate the slick, glistening pavement. The cool air invites a quiet day indoors, perfect for a moment spent nestled in your favorite cafe with a good book or enjoying the gentle rhythm of rain tapping against the window. As the day wears on, the prospect of staying cozy and dry might be the wisest choice, allowing one to savor the soft, contemplative mood that this rainy day brings.
